title: Everything about Tahm is annoying
body:
His voice, his animations, his kit (not op, just annoying)
I don't like it when either team picks him ._.

He's also one of those champs that doesn't *move* back to their idle pose before starting an emote animation again. He instantly resets to his idle pose and starts the emote again, which for some reason drives me crazy. Fio and Diana have this problem too
